subject: Re: Intent
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
I would also like to thank the many people that e-mailed me in the 
past few months about the same problem.  Most have joined my board in 
lew of this situation, the board where we actually post files and 
throw ideas around.  If that dig was toward me, which it was.  My 
board has exactly 9 times the amount of posts as here and they are 
valid to teach others.  This board used to be a safe haven for ideas 
and collaboration, but even frank sumption left again because of the 
lack of research here.  He say's it's a disgrace and i agree.  He 
gives his boxes out and people are excited to have a piece of history 
and on the shelf it goes, never to be used at all.  There are only 2 
people that i know of that actually have frank's boxes and posted the 
results.  I think he is up to 40-something now, it's just sad that 
his boxes go unused.  If people don't know how to go over files, i am 
always here to help.  And for new researchers who are intrigued by 
this box communication, i am sorry that none is done here and you 
have no way to learn.  But there are many venues out there that still 
teach about how these devices work and what to listen to.  I would 
post the link to my group, but i won't out of respect for Misty.

-Steve



--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, black bear hollow 
<blackbearhollow@...> wrote:

> My only intent on this list is to help. If you don't like what I 
post.

own

of

to

but

Simple.
